Posts.Content: Mary95 wrote: I don't post here much anymore or even login, but I was grateful for posts like these whenever I was in the throws of treatment. I am a 10 year survivor of Triple Negative BC. I had 8 rounds of chemo, then a double mastectomy and reconstruction. I miss my old breasts but at 51 they would probably be saggy and mine are still perky. Look for the joy! I wish you well as you wait for tests, treatments and hear those words, NID Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 10 year survivor of TN cancer Mary95 EastcoastTS
